oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Covenant of Faith Community Baptist Church, 2002 January
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Covenant of Faith Community Baptist Church located at 1209 Brick Church Pike in Nashville, Tennessee. Originally built as Grubbs Memorial Baptist Church, this building's address is no longer listed in the Nashville City Directory. The foundation was made of concrete block. The exterior walls were concrete blocks, with vinyl siding inside of the gables. The roof was gabled with tar shingles. The windows were small and square with metal frames and clear glass panes. The doors were wood and there was a small steeple atop the roof. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Covenant of Faith Community Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.); Grubbs Memorial Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
